mil3.3.7:2.1_2: udāhu manoviññāṇaṁ paṭhamaṁ uppajjati, pacchā cakkhuviññāṇan”ti?
mil3.3.7:3.1_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yatthāhaṁ uppajjāmi, tvampi tattha uppajjāhī’ti,
mil3.3.7:3.1_2: udāhu manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:4.2_1: dvārattā ca ciṇṇattā ca samudācaritattā cā”ti.
mil3.3.7:5.6_0: “Yena, bhante, purimaṁ udakaṁ gataṁ, tampi tena gaccheyyā”ti.
mil3.3.7:6.1_1: purimaṁ udakaṁ pacchimaṁ udakaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yenāhaṁ gacchāmi, tvampi tena gacchāhī’ti,
mil3.3.7:6.1_2: pacchimaṁ vā udakaṁ purimaṁ udakaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yena tvaṁ gacchissasi, ahampi tena gacchissāmī’”ti.
mil3.3.7:6.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi, ninnattā gacchantī”ti.
mil3.3.7:6.3_3: na cakkhuviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yatthāhaṁ uppajjāmi, tvampi tattha uppajjāhī’ti,
mil3.3.7:6.3_4: nāpi manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:6.3_5: ahampi tattha uppajjissāmī’ti, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi, ninnattā uppajjantī”ti.
mil3.3.7:7.3_1: rañño paccantimaṁ nagaraṁ assa daḷhapākāratoraṇaṁ ekadvāraṁ,
mil3.3.7:7.3_2: tato puriso nikkhamitukāmo bhaveyya, katamena nikkhameyyā”ti?
mil3.3.7:7.5_0: “Athāparo puriso nikkhamitukāmo bhaveyya, katamena so nikkhameyyā”ti?
mil3.3.7:7.6_0: “Yena, bhante, purimo puriso nikkhanto, sopi tena nikkhameyyā”ti.
mil3.3.7:8.1_1: purimo puriso pacchimaṁ purisaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yenāhaṁ gacchāmi, tvampi tena gacchāhī’ti,
mil3.3.7:8.1_2: pacchimo vā puriso purimaṁ purisaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yena tvaṁ gacchissasi, ahampi tena gacchissāmī’”ti.
mil3.3.7:8.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi, dvārattā gacchantī”ti.
mil3.3.7:8.3_3: na cakkhuviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yatthāhaṁ uppajjāmi, tvampi tattha uppajjāhī’ti,
mil3.3.7:8.3_4: nāpi manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:8.3_5: ahampi tattha uppajjissāmī’ti, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi, dvārattā uppajjantī”ti.
mil3.3.7:9.4_0: “Yena, bhante, purimaṁ sakaṭaṁ gataṁ, tampi tena gaccheyyā”ti.
mil3.3.7:10.1_1: purimaṁ sakaṭaṁ pacchimaṁ sakaṭaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yenāhaṁ gacchāmi, tvampi tena gacchāhī’ti,
mil3.3.7:10.1_2: pacchimaṁ vā sakaṭaṁ purimaṁ sakaṭaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yena tvaṁ gacchissasi, ahampi tena gacchissāmī’”ti.
mil3.3.7:10.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi, ciṇṇattā gacchantī”ti.
mil3.3.7:10.3_3: na cakkhuviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yatthāhaṁ uppajjāmi, tvampi tattha uppajjāhī’ti,
mil3.3.7:10.3_4: nāpi manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:10.3_5: ahampi tattha uppajjissāmī’ti, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi, ciṇṇattā uppajjantī”ti.
mil3.3.7:11.3_2: athāparena samayena nisammakiriyāya samudācaritattā adandhāyanā bhavati.
mil3.3.7:11.4_3: na cakkhuviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yatthāhaṁ uppajjāmi, tvampi tattha uppajjāhī’ti,
mil3.3.7:11.4_4: nāpi manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:11.4_5: ahampi tattha uppajjissāmī’ti, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi,
mil3.3.7:12.2_0: yattha ghānaviññāṇaṁ uppajjati … yattha jivhāviññāṇaṁ uppajjati … yattha kāyaviññāṇaṁ uppajjati,
mil3.3.7:13.1_2: udāhu manoviññāṇaṁ paṭhamaṁ uppajjati, pacchā kāyaviññāṇan”ti?
